div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Volume 71; Week of April 10, 1926...... Page 295.

body.p: A gift of $600,000.00 to the M. R. Hospital was the main bequest in the will of Henry L. Frank.

Mr. Frank, who had lived in Chicago since 1854, was 86 years old when he died on March 26. He amassed a fortune in the real estate business and retired twenty years ago. He was one of the founders of The Illinois Humane Society and a patron of the Chicago Symphony Orchestra.
